Alan Stenhouse Gourley (ubochí irí na àtó n'ọnwa Eprel 1909 rụọ úbọchị itoolu n'ọnwa Septemba 1991) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe nà South Africa-British nà ónyé na-eme ihe nkiri.
Ọ gàrà Glasgow School of Art n'afọ 1928 na Edinburgh College of Art n'etiti 1929 na 1931
Ọ kwagara South Africa ebe o mepụtara windo enyo maka katidral dị na Pretoria na Johannesburg ma kụzie na Johannesburg Technical College n'etiti afọ 1932 na 1937
Ọ kwagara Paris ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na École des Beaux-Arts n'etiti 1938 na 1940 ma bụrụ onye nkuzi na camouflage n'oge Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
A na-ahụ kapet nke o méré na South Africa House.
Ọrụ ya bụ akụkụ nkè ihe osise nà asọmpi nka na 1936 Summer Olympics na-anọchite ányá South Africa.
